'''1.21.31''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on September 30, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/30677359777805-Minecraft-1-21-31-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.31 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=September 30, 2024}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

This version has been reuploaded on the Google Play Store with the internal version number '''1.21.31.05''' on October 10, after [[Bedrock Edition beta 1.21.50.20]] was accidentally released to all users, even those not enrolled in the beta program.<ref name=beta-bugreport />

This is the first native version of ''Bedrock Edition'' for PlayStation 5, which was released on October 22, 2024. Shortly after release, the game was updated to [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.40|1.21.40]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.31 Hotfix
|183578|UI: D-pad positioning redo causing subluxation (metacarpophalangeal)
|185038|Transparent objects like water render as solid materials on Samsung Xclipse GPU devices
|185245|Various add-ons fail to load
|185282|World templates from the Marketplace no longer function and instead generate as normal worlds
|186676|Trading for emeralds using second slot causes game to crash
|186726|Entities (armor stands, villagers) drop down one block when reloaded
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Others'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* An issue where some commands did not recognize certain block or item names has been fixed.
